channel.title: [Soulsplit] Esstoren - Oldschool PvP
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/KhwrDok.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=4]Welcome to Esstoren - The best 2008 PvP Server on RSWebclients[/SIZE][/B]
[SIZE=4]Enjoy, Download link - [url=http://uppit.com/b6dqajlr1mqq/Esstoren_Package.zip]Download Esstoren.Package.zip @ UppIT[/url][/SIZE]
Esstoren is designed with players and PvP in mind. We take pride in how we put the player first, we have updated the server consistently and continue to do so with suggestions made by the players themselves in a way that we can keep Esstoren the best it can possibly be!
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1tDSBQ5.png[/img] Player Killing has been made to be as perfect as combat can be, with an innovation in Anti-Cheat PvP technology to allow for a stable and perfect economy, to maintaining the true oldschool look and feel of the game we loved so much.
Here is a quick list of are features:
[ul][*][b]Simple Starter! All server information in 2 books![/b] [*]KILLSTREAKS! The bounty increases the more you kill! [*]Perfect Combat [*]Balanced Weapons and Armour [*]Zero Lagg Switching [*]Token Economy - No Dupes! [*]Kill/Death Ratio - Keep track of your progress [*]Excellent Donator Features! [*]Turmoil Added - Only new feature! [*]All items can be used by Players! (No Donator only) [*]Multiple PvP Zones - Single, Teams, 0 Protect [*]Bosses! Earn items without tokens! [*]All OldSchool Skills! [*]Much more, check us out for more information![/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/a3G33a2.png[/img] [SPOILER] Starter Pack - Spawn book with all the start-up spawns! [img]http://puu.sh/3nhy0.jpg[/img]
Killstreaks! Get bonus's for killing those who are owning to much! [img]http://puu.sh/3gWHt.jpg[/img]
Perfectly Designed Home, Maximum efficiency for PvP action! [img]http://puu.sh/3gzjF.jpg[/img]
Shops! Designed to have a strong Economy, only tokens work in these. [img]http://puu.sh/3gzuh.png[/img][img]http://puu.sh/3gzwl.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3gzxP.png[/img][img]http://puu.sh/3gzyw.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3gzz1.png[/img][img]http://puu.sh/3gzKV.jpg[/img][/SPOILER]
Changelog:
[SPOILER]June 20th
[ul][*]VPS Hosted [*]Overall Upgrade [*]Lagg FREE PvP - Many edits! [*]Items tweaked. [*]First Donator - Harri [*]Website Improvements [*]Dupe Fix.[/ul]
June 19th
[ul][*]Esstoren 2.0 started [*]Dupes patched, items removed from eco [*]Hilts made unspawnable, monster tele added [*]Website added [*]Donations lauched @ 200k tokens per $1 [*]Forums launched - still working on them[/ul]
June 18th
[ul][*]Attack Option in Safe Zone removed. [*]Multi-Pk tweaked [*]Partyhat Event [*]20 players achieved! [*]Hybrid switches updated/improved [*]Other small bug fixes.[/ul]
June 17th
[ul][*]3rd Age unspawnable [*]DOR unspawnable [*]Fury noted and un-noted spawnable [*]Dragon 2h nerfed.[/ul]
June 16th
[ul][*]Killstreak error fixed. [*]Invisible pking bug patched. [*]Killstreaks now work correctly [*]Quest tab additions (Kills, deaths and current killstreak) [*]Pk points to be added, deciding on use [*]Portal suggestions are to be tested. [*]Dragon boots made spawnable, removed from unspawn list. [*]Torso is now unspawnable.[/ul]
June 15th
[ul][*]Dragon Fireshield patch [*]Dragon boots unspawn - added to shop [*]Prices changed to match Eco [*]Donation perks added [*]Added the epic dicing potato [*]Spec restore per 120 for donor [*]Shops now use tokens, killstreaks tweaked [*]Killstreak rewards added[/ul]
June 14th
[ul][*]New Home Completed - Castle wars [*]non-Spawn items added to list [*]token eco created [*]10 player milestone! [*]first mod : Remix [*]lagg fixes[/ul]
June 13th
[ul][*]Server Released! [*]Beta Testing [*]Shops added/redone [*]Home Moved[/ul]
[/SPOILER]
[size=x-small]'Play now', 'Website', 'Player Killing' and 'Media' pictures are outsourced. Credits to there original creator respectively.[/size][/CENTER]

item.title: [Soulsplit] Esstoren - Oldschool PvP
item.dc:creator: @Esstoren Esstoren
item.description:
@Esstoren wrote:

[CENTER]

KhwrDok.png728×90

[SIZE=4]Welcome to Esstoren - The best 2008 PvP Server on RSWebclients[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Enjoy, Download link - Download Esstoren.Package.zip @ UppIT[/SIZE]

Esstoren is designed with players and PvP in mind. We take pride in how we put the player first, we have updated the server consistently and continue to do so with suggestions made by the players themselves in a way that we can keep Esstoren the best it can possibly be!


Player Killing has been made to be as perfect as combat can be, with an innovation in Anti-Cheat PvP technology to allow for a stable and perfect economy, to maintaining the true oldschool look and feel of the game we loved so much.

Here is a quick list of are features:

[ul][]Simple Starter! All server information in 2 books!
[]KILLSTREAKS! The bounty increases the more you kill!
[]Perfect Combat
[]Balanced Weapons and Armour
[]Zero Lagg Switching
[]Token Economy - No Dupes!
[]Kill/Death Ratio - Keep track of your progress
[]Excellent Donator Features!
[]Turmoil Added - Only new feature!
[]All items can be used by Players! (No Donator only)
[]Multiple PvP Zones - Single, Teams, 0 Protect
[]Bosses! Earn items without tokens!
[]All OldSchool Skills!
[]Much more, check us out for more information![/ul]


[SPOILER]
Starter Pack - Spawn book with all the start-up spawns!

Killstreaks! Get bonus’s for killing those who are owning to much!

Perfectly Designed Home, Maximum efficiency for PvP action!

Shops! Designed to have a strong Economy, only tokens work in these.


[/SPOILER]

Changelog:

[SPOILER]June 20th

[ul][]VPS Hosted
[]Overall Upgrade
[]Lagg FREE PvP - Many edits!
[]Items tweaked.
[]First Donator - Harri
[]Website Improvements
[*]Dupe Fix.[/ul]

June 19th

[ul][]Esstoren 2.0 started
[]Dupes patched, items removed from eco
[]Hilts made unspawnable, monster tele added
[]Website added
[]Donations lauched @ 200k tokens per $1
[]Forums launched - still working on them[/ul]

June 18th

[ul][]Attack Option in Safe Zone removed.
[]Multi-Pk tweaked
[]Partyhat Event
[]20 players achieved!
[]Hybrid switches updated/improved
[]Other small bug fixes.[/ul]

June 17th

[ul][]3rd Age unspawnable
[]DOR unspawnable
[]Fury noted and un-noted spawnable
[]Dragon 2h nerfed.[/ul]

June 16th

[ul][]Killstreak error fixed.
[]Invisible pking bug patched.
[]Killstreaks now work correctly
[]Quest tab additions (Kills, deaths and current killstreak)
[]Pk points to be added, deciding on use
[]Portal suggestions are to be tested.
[]Dragon boots made spawnable, removed from unspawn list.
[]Torso is now unspawnable.[/ul]

June 15th

[ul][]Dragon Fireshield patch
[]Dragon boots unspawn - added to shop
[]Prices changed to match Eco
[]Donation perks added
[]Added the epic dicing potato
[]Spec restore per 120 for donor
[]Shops now use tokens, killstreaks tweaked
[]Killstreak rewards added[/ul]

June 14th

[ul][]New Home Completed - Castle wars
[]non-Spawn items added to list
[]token eco created
[]10 player milestone!
[]first mod : Remix
[]lagg fixes[/ul]

June 13th

[ul][]Server Released!
[]Beta Testing
[]Shops added/redone
[]Home Moved[/ul]

[/SPOILER]

[size=x-small]‘Play now’, ‘Website’, ‘Player Killing’ and ‘Media’ pictures are outsourced. Credits to there original creator respectively.[/size][/CENTER]
